  "title": "Logistics Manager",
  "description": "At HRD Solutions, we provide performance focused support to businesses in the areas of business strategy, organizational design and Human Resource Consulting.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Design and develop standard operating methods to manage logistics operations efficiently.
	Develop and execute methodologies to enable effective implementation of logistic plans
	Liaise with suppliers, logistic vendors, and end users to resolve any outstanding issues.
	Responsible for preparing shipping documentation and providing support in merging materials into single shipments, including crating and packing when necessary.
	Analyse and achieve the requirements of all shipping and commercial documentations for all deliveries and identify correct approvals, handling, and packaging.
	Maintains quality and efficiency throughout the logistic processes.
	Resolve general logistics problems, variations, and dispute issues, with an appreciation of the overall value-effectiveness of solutions.
	Achieve logistics and expediting activities between suppliers, logistics vendors, and end users to satisfy business requirements and targeted savings.
	Establish ethical relationships with suppliers and logistic vendors to ensure the most cost-effective solutions.
	Organise transportation activities, including storage of goods, managing information accrued from point of origin to delivery, orchestrating transportation movements, and arranging for services as necessary.
	Review freight rates and other transportation costs to keep working costs low.
	Monitor logistic vendors and provide reports on performance, costs, and product development.
	Assess efficiency of suppliers and vendors, and proffer solutions to ongoing problems.
	The expediter works to maintain the movement of materials from vendors and suppliers
	Provide support to the Purchasing Manager to ensure that strategies developed for products are aligned with the overall business strategy
	monitors the orders to be sure that the materials are delivered in the specified amount of time.
	Maintains contact with the shipping or transportation companies to prevent delays in shipments.
	Inspects goods upon delivery to ensure that the standards of quality are met, and the appropriate quantity/quality has been received.
	Ensure that the appropriate goods are transferred to each client before deadline.


Skills and Specifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree
	5 - 8 years of experience as a logistics professional.
	Supply chain certification is an additional advantage.
	Third-Party Coordination: Managing relationships with transporters, freight forwarders, and 3PL providers.
	Warehouse Operations: Oversight of receiving, storage, picking, and dispatch.
	Inventory Management: Keeping stock levels optimized while avoiding shortages or overstocking
	Fleet &amp; Route Optimization: Ensuring goods are delivered in the fastest, most cost-efficient manner.
	Regulatory Knowledge: Familiarity with customs, shipping regulations, safety standards, and import/export procedures.
	Scalability Planning: Designing systems and processes that can grow with the business.


Salary
N400,000 - N450,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;applications to:&nbsp;hrdsolutionsnig@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

        At HRD Solutions, we provide performance focused support to businesses in the areas of business strategy, organizational design and Human Resource Consulting.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Manager

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Design and develop standard operating methods to manage logistics operations efficiently.
	Develop and execute methodologies to enable effective implementation of logistic plans
	Liaise with suppliers, logistic vendors, and end users to resolve any outstanding issues.
	Responsible for preparing shipping documentation and providing support in merging materials into single shipments, including crating and packing when necessary.
	Analyse and achieve the requirements of all shipping and commercial documentations for all deliveries and identify correct approvals, handling, and packaging.
	Maintains quality and efficiency throughout the logistic processes.
	Resolve general logistics problems, variations, and dispute issues, with an appreciation of the overall value-effectiveness of solutions.
	Achieve logistics and expediting activities between suppliers, logistics vendors, and end users to satisfy business requirements and targeted savings.
	Establish ethical relationships with suppliers and logistic vendors to ensure the most cost-effective solutions.
	Organise transportation activities, including storage of goods, managing information accrued from point of origin to delivery, orchestrating transportation movements, and arranging for services as necessary.
	Review freight rates and other transportation costs to keep working costs low.
	Monitor logistic vendors and provide reports on performance, costs, and product development.
	Assess efficiency of suppliers and vendors, and proffer solutions to ongoing problems.
	The expediter works to maintain the movement of materials from vendors and suppliers
	Provide support to the Purchasing Manager to ensure that strategies developed for products are aligned with the overall business strategy
	monitors the orders to be sure that the materials are delivered in the specified amount of time.
	Maintains contact with the shipping or transportation companies to prevent delays in shipments.
	Inspects goods upon delivery to ensure that the standards of quality are met, and the appropriate quantity/quality has been received.
	Ensure that the appropriate goods are transferred to each client before deadline.


Skills and Specifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree
	5 - 8 years of experience as a logistics professional.
	Supply chain certification is an additional advantage.
	Third-Party Coordination: Managing relationships with transporters, freight forwarders, and 3PL providers.
	Warehouse Operations: Oversight of receiving, storage, picking, and dispatch.
	Inventory Management: Keeping stock levels optimized while avoiding shortages or overstocking
	Fleet & Route Optimization: Ensuring goods are delivered in the fastest, most cost-efficient manner.
	Regulatory Knowledge: Familiarity with customs, shipping regulations, safety standards, and import/export procedures.
	Scalability Planning: Designing systems and processes that can grow with the business.


Salary
N400,000 - N450,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: hrdsolutionsnig@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Operations Manager",
  "description": "At HRD Solutions, we provide performance focused support to businesses in the areas of business strategy, organizational design and Human Resource Consulting.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Oversee execution of procurement projects from planning to completion.
	Develop and implement best sourcing practices for sourcing officers to ensure the best sourcing results and most competitive pricing, including monitoring.
	Coordinate between quoting and sourcing to ensure timely release of quotations to customers.
	Coordinate between quoting, sourcing, and logistics to ensure timely delivery
	Implement quality control measures during engineering and procurement processes. Ensure compliance with industry standards, safety protocols, and client expectations.
	Ensure internal communication between sales, quoting, sourcing and finance.
	Monitor and improve operational systems, processes, and best practices.
	Track project timelines, budgets, and KPIs; report regularly to management.
	Manage vendor relationships and resolve procurement-related issues.
	Process Optimization: Develop and improve standard operating procedures (SOPs) for project delivery, Identify process bottlenecks and implement solutions to improve efficiency and reduce costs, introduce automation.
	Prepare reports on vendors performance.
	Implement and maintain quality assurance procedures across operations.
	Conduct operational risk assessments and develop mitigation plans.
	Assist in strategic planning and business development initiatives.
	Foster a culture of continuous improvement and accountability


Core Competencies


	5 -&nbsp;8 years experience in managing cross functional team within the FMCG, Oil and Gas or Engineering Procurement industry.
	In-depth experience with Local and international sourcing
	Vendor sourcing, negotiation, and logistics coordination
	Certified Supply Chain Professional
	Ability to streamline workflows and eliminate inefficiencies
	Excellent at creating reports, SOPs, and feedback loops
